actionCalls.name: Customer_AMC_Not_Available_Push_Notification
actionCalls.label: Customer AMC Not Available Push Notification

actionCalls.name: Customer_DLP_Not_Available_Push_Notification
actionCalls.label: Customer DLP Not Available Push Notification

assignments.name: Assign_Case_Number_and_Unit_name
assignments.label: Assign Case Number and Unit name

decisions.name: Check_for_Customer_Not_Available_AMC
decisions.label: Check for Customer Not Available AMC

formulas.name: CancelledCaseBody
formulas.expression: "Your appointment for " & {!ProblemCode} & " has been cancelled at your request. "

formulas.name: CancelledCaseBodyAMC
formulas.expression: "Your appointment for " & {!AMCSubCategory} & " has been cancelled at your request. "

formulas.name: ClosedCaseARBody
formulas.expression: 'يسعدنا أن نبلغك بأن حالتك المسجلة بمرجع رقم ' + {!$Record.case__r.CaseNumber} + ' قد تمت معالجتها وإغلاقها.'

formulas.name: ClosedCaseBody
formulas.expression: 'We are happy to inform you that your case logged under reference number ' + {!$Record.case__r.CaseNumber} + ' has been resolved and is now closed.'

formulas.name: CustomerNotAvailableBody
formulas.expression: "We couldn't reach you for your scheduled job. Please contact for rescheduling."

formulas.name: DLPARBody
formulas.expression: 'تم حجز موعد للصيانة في يوم ' + TEXT({!$Record.case__r.Appointment_Date__c}) + ' للوحدة ' + {!$Record.case__r.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' بموجب رقم الحالة ' + {!$Record.case__r.CaseNumber} + '.'

formulas.name: DLPBody
formulas.expression: 'Your DLP maintenance appointment is scheduled on ' + TEXT({!$Record.case__r.Appointment_Date__c}) + ' for unit ' + {!$Record.case__r.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' under Case Number ' + {!$Record.case__r.CaseNumber} + '.'

formulas.name: DLPTitle
formulas.expression: 'DLP appointment for unit ' + {!$Record.case__r.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' of Case Number ' + {!$Record.case__r.CaseNumber}

formulas.name: ISclosedcasebody
formulas.expression: "Your request has been successfully completed. Thankyou for choosing our services."

formulas.name: NewCaseARBody
formulas.expression: {!$Record.case__r.CaseNumber} + 'تم تسجيل حالة جديدة بموجب رقم الحالة: '

formulas.name: NewCaseBody
formulas.expression: 'New Case has been logged under Case Number: '+ {!$Record.case__r.CaseNumber}

formulas.name: ProblemCode
formulas.expression: TRIM( CASE( LEN(TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c})) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}), "-", "")), 0, TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}), 1, RIGHT(TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}), LEN(TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c})) - FIND("-", TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}))), 2, RIGHT(TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}), LEN(TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c})) - FIND("-", TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}), FIND("-", TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c})) + 1)), 3, RIGHT(TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}), LEN(TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c})) - FIND("-", TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}), FIND("-", TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}), FIND("-", TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c})) + 1) + 1)), 4, RIGHT(TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}), LEN(TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c})) - FIND("-", TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}), FIND("-", TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}), FIND("-", TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}), FIND("-", TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c})) + 1) + 1) + 1)), TEXT({!$Record.case__r.ProblemCode__c}) ) )

formulas.name: ReScheduledCbody
ReScheduledCbodyAMC
ScheduledCaseBody
ScheduledCaseBodyAMC
